page.topic: Adding and Aligning Controls in an Absolute Layout Container
page.description: The Absolute Layout Container allows you to use a 'what you see is what you get' type builder when adding and arranging controls inside a component.

step.description: In the UX Builder on the UX Controls page open the 'Data Controls' menu. Click on the [TextBox] option to add a textbox control to the component. Give the textbox the name and label of 'firstname'.
Add five more [TextBox] controls to the component. Name and label these controls 'lastname', 'address', 'city', 'state', and 'zip'.
Highlight all of the textbox controls. Open the 'Containers' menu and click on the [Container] option.
From the Container Type list select the 'AbsoluteLayout' option and click 'Insert Around'

section.title: Add Controls to the Absolute Container

step.description: Highlight the opening tag for the AbsoluteLayout container, "[AbsoluteLayout: ABSOLUTELAYOUT_1]".

In the properties list on the right, in the 'Container Begin Properties' section, click the [...] button next to the 'Absolute positions for controls' property. The 'Set Absolute Position and Size' editor will open.

There should be a dotted rectangle inside the 'Set Absolute Position and Size' editor's middle panel. This represents the size of the 'AbsoluteLayout' container as it will appear when the component is run.
Use the grey triangle in the lower right-hand corner of this dotted line to make the absolute layout container larger.
In the fields list in the top left corner highlight the 'firstname' field.

Place the mouse cursor inside the dotted line representing the absolute layout container. Hold down the left mouse button, and drag out a rectangle. Drag the rectangle until it is the size that you want the firstname textbox control to appear.

Release the left mouse button to drop the rectangle. The 'lastname' textbox control should automatically become highlighted. Drag out a second box to add the lastname textbox to the 'Absolute Layout' container.
Place the remaining controls inside the absolute layout container. Click OK to return to the UX Controls page.
Run the component in Live Preview. The controls should appear just as they did inside the 'Set Absolute Position and Size' editor.
